episodes.author: The_Bobby_Bones_Show
episodes.summary: Bobby talks about all the celebrities he met at the iHeartRadio Music Awards on Sunday night plus all the behind the scenes action he didn't get to talk about on-air. He also explains what happened with the screw up on the show this morning.

episodes.author: The_Bobby_Bones_Show

episodes.title: BobbyCast Ep. 32 - Brian O'Connell (Live Nation President of Country Touring) (1-16-17)
episodes.author: The_Bobby_Bones_Show
episodes.summary: Bobby is joined this week by Brian O'Connell who is the President of Country Touring at Live Nation. He has created major country festivals such as Faster Horses, Watershed, Lake Shake and Route 91. He also produces tours for Luke Bryan, Jason Aldean, Brooks and Dunn and more! Bobby asks him about what goes into putting on a festival and how which artists he's seen turn into superstars.

episodes.title: BobbyCast Episode 30 - Brandon from LANco (1-4-17)
episodes.author: The_Bobby_Bones_Show

Bobby also declares Brandon as the Chris Martin (Coldplay) of Country music!

episodes.title: BobbyCast Ep. 26 - Chris Janson (12-5-16)
episodes.author: The_Bobby_Bones_Show
episodes.summary: Bobby is joined today by Chris Janson. Bobby and Chris talk about his current song "Holdin' Her" and what it means to him. Chris gets into stories he has never told anyone. He talks about how he grew up in a small town and never even thought that making it in music was a possibility. They talk about Chris' first year trying to make it in Nashville, songs he had cut and all the major success he has had in the past year.

episodes.title: BobbyCast Ep. 22 - Lauren Alaina (11-15-16)
episodes.author: The_Bobby_Bones_Show
episodes.summary: Bobby is joined this week by Lauren Alaina! Bobby and Lauren talk about her journey on American Idol and being so young with having this new crazy lifestyle thrown at her. Bobby also talks to Lauren about how she struggled with an eating disorder and how it affected her personal life and career. Bobby also asks Lauren about her career goals and where she sees herself.
